verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G379>inexcusable,<s%> O <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> that <S%G2919>judge:<s%> for <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> you <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> you <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G4572>yourself;<s%> for you that <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> things.

But we are <S%G1492>sure<s%> that the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them which <S%G4238>commit<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things.

And <S%G3049>think<s%> you <S%G5124>this,<s%> O <S%G444>man,<s%> that <S%G2919>judge<s%> them which <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things, and <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> that you shall <S%G1628>escape<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> you the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of his <S%G5544>goodness<s%> and <S%G463>forbearance<s%> and <S%G3115>long-suffering;<s%> not <S%G50>knowing<s%> that the <S%G5543>goodness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leads<s%> you to <S%G3341>repentance?<s%>

But <S%G2596>after<s%> your <S%G4643>hardness<s%> and <S%G279>impenitent<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2343>treasure<s%> up to <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> and <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G1341>righteous<s%> <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2041>deeds:<s%>

To them who by <S%G5281>patient<s%> <S%G5281>continuance<s%> in <S%G18>well<s%> <S%G2041>doing<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G861>immortality,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life:<s%>

But to them that are <S%G1537>contentious,<s%> <S%G2052><s%> and do not <S%G544>obey<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G2372>indignation<s%> and <S%G3709>wrath,<s%>

<S%G2347>Tribulation<s%> and <S%G4730>anguish,<s%> on <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> that does <S%G2556>evil,<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Gentile;<s%>

But <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2038>works<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Gentile:<s%>
For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4382>respect<s%> of <S%G4382>persons<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For as <S%G3745>many<s%> as have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G460>without<s%> <S%G460>law<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G460>without<s%> <S%G460>law:<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as have <S%G264>sinned<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> by the <S%G3551>law;<s%>

(For not the <S%G202>hearers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> but the <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G1344>justified.<s%>

For <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the things contained in the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3778>these,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> not the <S%G3551>law,<s%> are a <S%G3551>law<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves:<s%>

<S%G3748>Which<s%> <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> their <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G4828>also<s%> <S%G4828>bearing<s%> <S%G4828>witness,<s%> and their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> the <S%G3342>mean<s%> while <S%G2723>accusing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>else<s%> <S%G626>excusing<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%>)

In the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>
<S%G2396>Behold,<s%> you are <S%G2028>called<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> and <S%G1879>rest<s%> in the <S%G3551>law,<s%> and <S%G2744>make<s%> your <S%G2744>boast<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
And <S%G1097>know<s%> his <S%G2307>will,<s%> and <S%G1381>approve<s%> the things that are more <S%G1308>excellent,<s%> being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out of the <S%G3551>law;<s%>
And are <S%G3982>confident<s%> that you <S%G4572>yourself<s%> are a <S%G3595>guide<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> of them which are in <S%G4655>darkness,<s%>

An <S%G3810>instructor<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish,<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G3516>babes,<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> and of the <S%G225>truth<s%> in the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

You <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> you not <S%G4572>yourself?<s%> you that <S%G2784>preach<s%> a man should not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> do you <S%G2813>steal?<s%>

You that <S%G3004>say<s%> a man should not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> do you <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery?<s%> you that <S%G948>abhor<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> do you <S%G2416>commit<s%> <S%G2416>sacrilege?<s%>
You that <S%G2744>make<s%> your <S%G2744>boast<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3847>breaking<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G818>dishonor<s%> you <S%G2316>God?<s%>
For the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> you, as it is <S%G1125>written.<s%>

For <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G5623>profits,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4238>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> you be a <S%G3848>breaker<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> your <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> shall not his <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>counted<s%> for <S%G4061>circumcision?<s%>

And shall not <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> which is by <S%G5449>nature,<s%> if it <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> you, <S%G3588>who<s%> by the <S%G1121>letter<s%> and <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> do <S%G3848>transgress<s%> the <S%G3551>law?<s%>
For he is not a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> which is one <S%G1722>outwardly;<s%> <S%G5318><s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> is that <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> which is <S%G1722>outward<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

But he is a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> which is one <S%G1722>inwardly;<s%> <S%G2927><s%> and <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that of the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and not in the <S%G1121>letter;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is not of <S%G444>men,<s%> but of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
